product_name: Merrell Aquasquirt Mary Jane Jr. Water Shoes - Toddler Girls'
long_description: A perfect complement to your young water lover's natural inclinations, the Merrell Aquasquirt Mary Jane Jr. Water Shoes give your little girl quick-drying performance in an ultra-streamlined package. Water-friendly materials are made for jumping in and out all day. A carved-out sole cuts the bulk. Rubber outsoles provide good traction. Merrell Aquasquirt Mary Jane Jr. Water Shoes are vegan-friendly.
short_description: A perfect complement to your young water lover's natural inclinations, the Merrell Aquasquirt Mary Jane Jr. Water Shoes give your little girl quick-drying performance in an ultra-streamlined package.
